column1: How dare you do thing like that, you know, you 're sort of, you, you just can't, you 're almost beside yourself, as you 're trying to use up all that adrenaline, all that energy that's poured into your body as you try to help that child across the road, knowing in actual fact you can't.

column1: ‘ You are beside yourself!’ he uttered, stepping involuntarily backwards.
